content:
My teacher 
 Zimbili Dlamini and Hlengiwe 
 Zondi 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I love my teacher. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 She is beautiful. She is a 
 
 god teacher. She is kind 
 
 and patient. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 She has braided her hair so 
 
 nicely. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 She has put colourful 
 
 beads in her hair. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Her beads are gren, white, 
 
 red, and yelow. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mom, please would you 
 
 braid my hair like my 
 
 teacher's? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 When I am older I wil also 
 
 put beads in my hair. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I wil grow up to be just like 
 
 my teacher! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8
